title: View of the Remains of the Dining Rom of Nero's Golden House, commonly called the Temple of Peace
marks:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on back, in pe LLC, in the plate: [Cavalier Piranesi F]; LRC, in
description: three very large archways, cut with various smaller arches on two levels and surmounted by free-standing arches; goats and figures at right in middle ground; figures with a wagon and two horses in foreground; other figures and mule in LLC
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
